onBackPressed() - Method in class group2.shah.mili.zuhlke.matt.emoviecon.EMovieConActivity

onBindViewHolder(MovieRecyclerAdapter.MovieViewHolder, int) - Method in class group2.shah.mili.zuhlke.matt.emoviecon.MovieRecyclerAdapter
Binds the data to the view holder and sets images and onlicklisteners to the content Easier to set onclick listeners here than to create another view layout if we were to set it in onCreateViewHolder.

Overridden method to start the activity "About Us" from the layout.
